column5: I like that!... and you do have a point, but our cold is a different kinda cold! Ours is a  "Bone Chillin' Redneck Cold".  Y'all have that "Canadian Freezin' Ass Cold"!!!

You guys missed the snow it seems...talking to my family in VA they have been having a hard time after those storms a few weeks ago.   Keep it up GCD, looks like that suit will be put to good use. Of course you could always bring a little sour mash along and fish in a t shirt.
Nice fish under pretty tough weather for that area  Looks like it is snowing in northern half of Alabama from this latest radar.  http://www.intellicast.com/National/Radar/...cation=USGA0132
Good to see ya again Bubba.  I didn't realise till now how much I missed ya!!  You sure that's a blue cat??!  cheers HD
That suit looks good on ya!
stephanie : that ugly barbotte makes you look good!
dont tell him that ...he will wear it to the next wedding he attends  but it does accent his eyes nicely...

I tried that once, and that's how I found out I was a Redneck... You might be a Redneck if you've ever been too drunk to fish!    We got some flurries today, but it was just a smattering... not even any acumulation.    I've been wondering where you've been and been worried sick about you!!!.. you can't call???  I'm absatively posalutely certain that's a Blue Cat!!!    HA!... you just like to see me freezin' my butt off!!!    She says the sweetest things eh!    That's the same thing my wife said!!!
That's a really nice fish.   Really nice.  btw - love the float suit.
Cold???? Suck it up princess!  keep a flask close by! Nice cat.... and the suit does wonders for ya!

Got on the water at 11:00 am and fished til 3:00 pm.  Caught 3 blue cats and no Crappie!:mad:  One of the cats was about 6 oz., another was about 1 1/2 lbs, and I got this 7 lb.-8 oz nice'un! All caught on Tuffie minnows while I was tryin' for Crappie.    I don't usually keep them this big, but I was fish hungry and invited it home for supper!  The water temp was 39*F and the Shad were hugging the bottom, there was evidence of winter kill but not nearly as bad as last year. The birds and some of the fish were still feeding.    I think last winters kill got most of the weak ones. We need some warm days!!!  Tried out the new Arctic Armor floatation suit and man is that thing ever nice!!! Light, very warm, and comfortable!!! The temps today were in the 30'*F and that was a heat wavel compared to the last 9 days! They're calling for snow tomorrow and then more freezin' temps 'til the end of next week!  I hold each and every one of you Canadians responsible for this... you will pay!!!
Nice Cat Dawg!  Get it cat/dog  Joey
Cold? I thought you lived in KissinCuzin, Bama??

Nice of you to show us a soft water report and make us drool     but you have to quit complaining aboot being cold    That's not even close to what the temps are up here  Joke / Joke  On the first pic, you certainly looked like you were freezing them bejewels of yours in that survival suit Awesome report and pics Glen I'm sure that cat will give you enough meat to satisfy your hunger Great job Glen Keep them reports coming and thanks for sharing Jacques
In case y'all havent heard...  http://www.msnbc.msn.com/id/34702526/ns/weather/
Did that hat come free with the suit?  Hat looks kinda "wimpy" to me.  Hahaha!  Nice job with the cat.  Fine fish.  When you ate it, did you immediately start growing whiskers?
your weak!! thats t-shirt weather here!

You've got to feel at least a bit superior in that you are dressed for the situation. You've got to be the only guy in Hog'sscrotum with an survival suit. You look like Nostradamus now! Good on ya!! Jim
Calgary we have a problem.Send your blistering temps down to alabama.

That done it!!!  ... I'm PMing my phone# to H2Whoa right now!!!  Shouldn't you be working on a wimpy motorsickle engine or sumpin?    Come fishing with me for a day in August and we'll see who's weak!
You tell 'em Glen.  I can hear the fizz of that can bottle of whoop-a$$ opening now.
as long as you have an unlimited quanity of CANADIAN beer, i mean soda pops
Hell Yeah!!!... and I'm buyin'!!!
then its a date
NAMBLA  North American Man Boy Love Association...
... and you know aboot that because how Archie???????
Beauty Cat, Dawd!
You now have a choice, worm dangler or H2.  Take them both out fishing!
....I see what ya did right there...   Wormie is small and womanly...go for him GCD...to remind you of your teenage days he can probably dress as a sheep too
Who is worm dangler????
thanks for the report! always enjoy the reports from 'murrica glad to see you get away from the keyboard once in a while!
ive seen it snow in August  and 28 Degrees in Febuary in Calgary
Quite the blue there, Glen. The yeller and green ain't bad either, snug as a bug in a rug. Glad you got out.
I thought you were Canadian dawg.....lol   Nice cat by the way.
If the water's still liquid, it ain't that cold!
